Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the gastrin/cholecystokinin family. Magainin subfamily
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18586467] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus (BCRC 10780)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Staphylococcus xylosus (BCRC 12930)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (BCRC 10781)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Listeria monocytogenes (BCRC 14845)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Streptococcus bovis (BCRC 14729)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Streptococcus iniae (laboratory strain)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Lactococcus garvieae (laboratory strain)(MIC=32 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :Klebsiella oxytoca (BCRC 13985)(MIC=64 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (BCRC 10944)(MIC=64 μg/ml), Escherichia coli (BCRC 10675)(MIC=64 μg/ml), Enterobacter aerogenes (BCRC 10370)(MIC=128 μg/ml), Enterobacter cloacae (BCRC 10401)(MIC=32 μg/ml), Yersinia enterocolitica (BCRC 13999)(MIC=128 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.18586467] MHC=128 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria
